long_description: There is always a match until ... Nada! Scoop up the dice and let 'em roll. With 3 play variations, the Blue Orange Nada! dice game pushes you to think sharp and act fast to match, snatch, and win. Roll the dice and scan the array for matching symbols between the orange and white dice. The first to call a match collects all the dice showing that symbol. No matches? No problem-it's another chance to win! Shout "Nada!" and snatch up all the dice; but speak too soon and you'll pay the price. Game improves focus, fine motor skills, visual perception and speech. Includes 36 dice, travel bag and illustrated rules.
